message.raw:
NI_DAQ_MX acquisition reports bugs to Paco.  Labscript is setup to do AI's
differently from how we did them in labview.  It sets up a buffer and reads
it out once it is filled and then waits for more data, rather than reading it
out in one get-go like we do with labview.

For now, I have increased the buffer size to match what NI suggests.
